label: claimedLanguageProficiency
comment: Personal language proficiency skills claimed by this found stowaway.
Personal language proficiency skills claimed by this guest person.
Personal language proficiency skills claimed by this trade party.

rangeIncludes.comment: Skills in any principal method of human communication, consisting of words used in a structured and conventional way and conveyed by speech, writing, or gesture.

domainIncludes.comment: A person who is found hiding aboard a ship or other conveyance, such as in order to obtain free passage or elude detection.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
